Meeting Days

Meeting Days

Sundays - Sunday Meeting

8:00am

A time where we come together and fellowship with one another in the presence of our father. Worship&Praise, Prayers and the Word.

Mondays - Prayer Meeting

6:00pm

A time where we come together to pertake in the LORD's Supper, remaining ourselves and the Spirit Beings that we belong to our Lord Jesus. And lift up our voices in prayers to our father.

Wednesdays - Bible Studies

5:30pm

A day we dedicate time to study the Word of God in-depth.
